DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether iloperidone is effective in the treatment of Schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Iloperidone Virus Risperidone to Treat Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Men or women ages 1865 years old. DSMIV diagnosis of schizophrenia. PANSS≥70. Of the 7 PANSS positive symptom subscale, at least two score ≥ 4 points. Written informed consent. Pregnant or nursing (lactating) women, or women who plan on conceiving during the course of the study. Clinically significant disease of the heart,kidneys,liver,hematonosis or endocrine system.
